sub_title: Founder of Localie ‚Äî a single app to make every trip special ‚ù§Ô∏è
summary: Ukraine-raised and Netherlands-based global tech entrepreneur, an alumni of the Dutch Startup Visa Program (2020). Since 2019, Nick is working as a full-time CEO at Localie ‚Äî a single app to make every trip special ‚ù§Ô∏è Localie has generated almost $1M in sales, actively growing now on the US, UK and Canada consumer markets. Nick has raised over $300K in pre-seed money from world leading VC institutions, based in Silicon Valley ‚Äî like Unpopular VC ‚Äî recently ranked the #3 most resilient venture capital firm after YC and Sequoia Capital, based on an analysis of AngelList data.

‚ú® Hire your local friend who matches your interests, meets you at the airport and shows you around
‚ú® Book and pay for everything securely with a single button

All built as a simple chat, powered by AI, real humans and our exclusive knowledge base built and maintained by verified locals.
